column4: guys, i'm unable to figure out how to set my monotir resolution to 1152x864
can someone please help
in an 865gbf mobo
none seem to work
i am only getting the options of four resolutions: 1280x1024 , 1024x768 , 800x600, 640x480,
but i was able to set the resolution to 1152x864 in windows 98, 2000, xp and vista
i did i did
using the first method, i get "debconf: DbDriver "config": /var/cache/debconf/config.dat is locked by another process: Resource temporarily unavailable"
anyone?
synaptic is not running. how do i check for apt get?
ps -aux | grep apt-get
i get "Warning: bad ps syntax, perhaps a bogus '-'? "
no worries about this.. if apt-get is runing this shuld show it
this should show it  I mean
that's the message that i get when i type your command in the terminal windwo
and someting like 10588  0.0  0.3   2880   760 pts/2    S+   22:32   0:00 grep apt-get ?
yes, to be exact, a url link followed by  -- ashwin   11358  0.0  0.1   2884   732 pts/2    R+   00:59   0:00 grep apt-get
if there no more result obviously apt-get isn't runing now on your copm
okay then back to the original problem
how do i fix this resolution problem? ubuntu will allow me to set the res to 1280x1024 or 1024x768 but not 1152x864 which is ironically lesser than the first
